articles.title: Diabetes: What impact does blood sugar have on depression risk? - Medical News Today
articles.description: Reduced gray matter volume in the brain may be able to explain the link between blood sugar fluctuations and depression risk, according to a new study.
articles.content:

articles.title: In older adults, a little excess weight isn’t always a bad thing - CNN
articles.description: Researchers have found that while obesity at any age risks harming health, a few extra pounds in later life isn’t cause for concern.
articles.content: Millions of people enter later life carrying an extra 10 to 15 pounds, weight theyve gained after having children, developing joint problems, becoming less active or making meals the center of their … [+8075 chars]
